website_summaries.verdict: Exceptional in maintaining  precise control of the soccer ball while protecting the most important commodity.
pros: Lightweight with protection around the head's circumference
Adjusts to your body as your own temperature changes
Holds up in practice and on the field
cons: May suffer breakdowns with extended use

customer_reviews.title: Great for goalkeepers!!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old daughter is a goalkeeper. She always refused to wear a concussion band until she got her 2nd concussion. She asked me to buy her one. We did some research, decided to start off light as there are bands out there that are very bulky. The day we received this in the mIl, my daughter used it at practice the same night. Not only did it keep her awake warm, she liked the feel and it looks like a headband. No one questioned her with what she was wearing because it resembles a thick headband. She wears it all the time now and will even forget she's wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The headgear out of the box is comfortable and allows for quick adjustment on the head as ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfort, control, and protection make this the go to headgear for my daughter moving forward. The headgear out of the box is comfortable and allows for quick adjustment on the head as the game is going on.The Halo 3 allows my player to head the ball comfortably without taking away from the ability to redirect the ball. This is definitely a game changer for her, protecting her head and allowing for comfort during play.
customer_reviews.author: Chrispy

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter after a double concussion in soccer! Was the best $50 investment ever! After her playing all soccer season with it on it stays where it needs to and also keeps her hair out of her face! But mainly it did what it wa suppose to do! She hardly felt any impact at all the few times she had to head bunt the ball! I think all the schools should be using these! A couple of the other kids on her team parents bought them as well! Very easy to clean also just soap and water and hand wash and dry by morning!
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, works & my SON WEARS IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After my son got 2 concussions I researched & chose this headband. This season we've had no injuries & HE WEARS IT! At 11 yrs old he wants to look cool & this has given him extra confidence since others have complimented his "headband". He's scoring avg of 3.5 goals a game so is in the rough & tumble of everything, my mind is a little more at ease knowing he has more protection. Just wish there was a way to better protect his spinal cord but this is a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Sg

customer_reviews.title: Advice
customer_reviews.text: Daughter was playing soccer and already had 1 concussion. We thought this was the answer to ease our worries. However it caused compression headaches in her which triggered migraines. If you are prone to migraines please be advised this fits snug and is supposed to fit snug however for us it did not work. I will say return policy is GREAT! Once we emailed company and explained situation they gave a full refund. They were very inderstanding
customer_reviews.author: Lara Devine

customer_reviews.title: We wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: The safety ratings were amazing so I got one for my kids to try. They couldn't stand it. We measured their heads as instructed but both felt like their heads were being squeezed super tight. But the next size up would def be too big. Would love it if they had a version with velcro so we could adjust. (I'd return it but my daughter hated it so much that she threw it off in the middle of practice and then we couldn't find it). I’ve since bought a similar product with Velcro and both kids happily wear it
customer_reviews.author: julesck

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit smaller than expected. My daughter is 14, 5' 6" and this was too small for her head.
customer_reviews.author: Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: D1 scholarship protection
customer_reviews.text: My daughter I got a concussion in January 2018 and suffered with the effects of it for almost one year we began to wear the Halo headband and it has protected her on a number of collisions she has been blessed to receive division 1 scholarship offers as a sophomore in basketball and I can see her wearing this for the rest of her high school basketball career. Alfie Burch ( Happy Dad )
customer_reviews.author: Alfie

customer_reviews.title: fashionable helmet
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to know I have a little extra cushion if I were to get hit again. Also acts as a sweatband, so it will stink like a b****. Overall love this product, $50 for a less extensive concussion is worth it. All the other protective wear is very expensive, and this does the job well. The hotter the temperature you're playing in the looser the headband will feel. It doesn't lose its elasticity (for the year that I've worn it so far).
customer_reviews.author: madhofer

customer_reviews.title: My keepers actually like it!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 girls are keepers and I’m terrified for their noggins. We haven’t had any big hits to the head (yet) but this looks just like headbands the others wear, so my girls don’t fight me at all to put it on. They actually told me they like wearing it! At least it gives me a little peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: SoccermomX3

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money - USELESS
customer_reviews.text: This "device" is totally useless. It is nothing more than a glorified headband. it will not protect your child's head from any trauma. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Iskowitz

customer_reviews.title: Head protection when helmets are not feasible
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for me when ice skating and one for ten-year-Old grandson when he’s skateboarding or riding his scooter. It’s comfortably snug and my grandson actually likes it. He also thinks it looks cool on him. It’s a win-win for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Work well.
customer_reviews.text: This does a good job of protecting your head. All soccer players should wear some kind of head gear to protect you from header dain bramage.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sanns

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Bought for granddaughter. She loves it. It is comfortable to wear. Protection was great. Trainer at school approved of it.
customer_reviews.author: SQLMAN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! A must need for all soccer players.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter and her teammate that both have gotten concessions. It is a great investment wish I would have bought it before and saved them both the pain. It should be required for soccer just like chin guards are. They both love the feel and comfort it provides. The only thing they both said is why black absorbs the heat from the sun and gets hot. Still they rather wear this one over others they have tried also black.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our daughter playing soccer, don't care for the logo being white should be same color as band, have to wash after ever use or unable to stretch on head for next use
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for protection
customer_reviews.text: I don't play soccer. I walk a fast-paced 2 mi every morning on uneven sidewalk and purchased this item to protect my forehead from a fall. It fits perfectly and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: excellent product; my son wears it in games and practice; wears well
customer_reviews.author: Edward J Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good quality, gives sufficient protection. The fabric does not fall appart like in my friend’s one from another comany. I wish the edges are a little wider. But still - i like it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kap

customer_reviews.title: It gives me some peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to wear while playing middle school soccer. After reading and researching, the Unequal Halo 3 seemed to me like the best choice. She likes it too!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Abbott

customer_reviews.title: ... it out several times to get it to fit comfortably as the circumference of my head is 24 inches
customer_reviews.text: Had to stretch it out several times to get it to fit comfortably as the circumference of my head is 24 inches, but I love it. I wear it every where I go.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Seriously fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! It gives you a week to two week delivery date but it came in two DAYs!! What amazing fast delivery. Very impressed. So glad. My daughter will have it for her tournament this coming weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Monica DeVito

customer_reviews.title: Protective
customer_reviews.text: I like how after you stretch it, it fits onto your head nicely and doesn't fall out of place. It isn't too tight or too loose and it works amazingly. I purchased it to help lessen the chances of me getting a fourth concussion.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Good for my head banging autistic son.
customer_reviews.text: My head banging autistic son likes this protective headgear and wears it everywhere. He even falls asleep with it on. It is helping.
customer_reviews.author: debi

customer_reviews.title: Full size and coverage for an adult
customer_reviews.text: Out of 3 different brands/suppliers this is the only one that provides full coverage for an adult. We are yet to see how it holds up but inital fit is snug.

customer_reviews.title: Isn’t made to last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16 yr. old daughter after suffering a concussion in volleyball. It helped her to feel more confident, but the material inside broke after 3 months of use. She was also constantly adjusting it as it slides up off her temples.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah McElroy

customer_reviews.title: too small for child
customer_reviews.text: Had to return as it wouldn't not fir on my 9 or 11 year old's head...which are smaller compared to others their age. Bummed because really wanted to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Aphotos

customer_reviews.title: Great for youth and high school!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing comfort. Especially great for u14 players just getting used to the larger game physicality and heading.
customer_reviews.author: CG3

customer_reviews.title: Safty
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes it and if it saves from a head injury I’m all for it.
customer_reviews.author: Magnum

customer_reviews.title: It’s comfortable to and provides great protection
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. It’s comfortable to wear and provides great protection.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great comfort along with the protection. Not as bulky as ither headbands.
customer_reviews.author: Liz F.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service in following up with issues on how to take care of the halo headband
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service and my daughter is protected as much as one player can be by wearing this halo headband!

customer_reviews.title: Love the Halo!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has 3 of these that we rotate out. Love love love

customer_reviews.text: This looks like a headband so my daughter does not feel self conscious wearing it.

customer_reviews.text: It was good for a couple of games and it broke.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My daughter really likes wearing this headgear at her games!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Leal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only head gear my daughter will wear without argument.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned for an adjustable style.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 year old to wear for soccer. Originally I liked that it was one solid piece. However my daughter could not wear this. She has a lot of hair and we couldn't get it on her head. Therefore we returned it for an adjustable headband by a different brand and it works wonderfully. I think adjustable head gear is more practical for sizing.
customer_reviews.author: LILREDD

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old daughter wore this for 5 games. By the time she went to put it on for the 6th game, the protective piece on the inside snapped in half, therefore causing the headband to stretch out, and no longer fit her head. Had I known it wouldn't make it for a season, I would have just purchased a less expensive option, and gotten a second one for a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product- great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size 2 for my ten your old but it was a little bit big. My son accidentally threw away the packing slip from amazon so I was worried I might not be able to return it. But the customer service folks at Halo were amazing! They shipped me a size 1 that day and included an address label and bag for me to return the size 2. My daughter is very agreeable to wearing the headband and actually thinks it's cool!
customer_reviews.author: Randi

product_meta.title: Unequal Halo 3 Lightweight Protective Headgear (2 oz.) with Military-Grade Patented Composite, Coated Aramid Fabric, Airilon Comfort Foam
product_meta.description: The Unequal Halo 3 has received high marks in 3rd party independent research at Virginia Tech. In fact, their data shows our complete line of protective headgear to be the best performing in the country. Halo 3 received Virginia Tech’s “Recommended” 4-Star Rating. It’s a very light, very thin design that looks just like a headband, which players love. But don’t let it’s looks deceive you! This Halo’s advanced, military-grade materials reduce acceleration and absorb/disperse impact force. From newbies to veterans, the protection is noticeable and improves player confidence as they feel the difference. Halo is great for non-helmet sports, including soccer, basketball, volleyball, girls lacrosse, field hockey, cheerleading, figure skating as well as other life situations where good looking head protection is needed. For soccer, does not alter ball rebound speed or direction and is FIFA Law 4 compliant. Halo 3 was designed for a fashionable and comfortable look. 83% Polyester, 17% Spandex, black fabric with a silver logo on front. Comes in Size 1 (20.5" or less) & Size 2 (21" +). Fits your head as a closed loop with a snug, stretchy fit. To acquire your proper fit, use a measuring tape. Halo 3 has powerful, protective properties that may stiffen in cool/cold environments when not on your head. Simply knead the foam with your fingers for a few seconds or hold it close to your body heat and will quickly start to soften. Once warm, stretch slightly, and place on your head. Once you wear it for a few minutes, Halo 3 will soften even more and be so comfortable you’ll forget it’s on your head. Should be stored at room temperature. For more details and instruction graphics, see our "Help" page on the Unequal Amazon storefront for size, placement & fit - https://goo.gl/SjPxfP
feature_bullets: LIGHTEST PROTECTIVE HEADGEAR (2 oz.) HIGHLY RANKED ON VIRGINIA TECH’s SOCCER HEADGEAR IMPACT TESTS that determined that wearing headgear provides a reduction in risk of head injury - Evaluated & received the “RECOMMENDED” 4-Star Rating (★★★★) for proven effectiveness by VT’s independent/accredited lab

PLAYER APPROVED STYLISH DESIGN FOR MAXIMUM WEARABILITY - LOOKS JUST LIKE A TRADITIONAL HEADBAND, snug/secure fit, sleek and fashionable head coverage, 360-degrees of impact protection, 6mm thin vs. heavier & bulkier alternatives, FIFA Law 4 compliant

UTILIZES UNEQUAL’S PROVEN EFFECTIVE NURO TECHNOLOGY, A PATENTED MILITARY-GRADE COMPOSITE of high-tech comfort that reduces acceleration, absorbs and deflects strike force. Contains a coated aramid fabric (with it’s proven impact dispersion properties), along with Unequal’s Airilon (memory) foam that pleasantly softens while on your head

IN SOCCER, PLAYERS REPORT HALO 3 DOES NOT ALTER BALL REBOUND SPEED OR DIRECTION - Especially useful during team drills where players are at repetitive risk of falls, collisions and headers, use in basketball, girls lacrosse, field hockey, flag football, cheer-leading, curling, volleyball, etc.

SIZING: ONLY TWO SIZES (SIZE 1 & 2) MOST PLAYERS PREFER SIZE 2 (for 21”+ heads & above) SIZE 1 IS A TIGHT FIT (for 20.5” heads & below) - Younger kids don’t necessarily have smaller heads. We find that over 85% of kids take size 2. It’s always best to measure! Use our fit tips chart for best sizing accuracy.
